category.item: Members of this usergroup can add categories.
Members of this usergroup can add entry prefixes.
Members of this usergroup can delete categories.
Members of this usergroup can delete entry prefixes.
Members of this usergroup can edit categories.
Members of this usergroup can edit entry prefixes.
Members of this usergroup can move entries into the recycle bin.
Members of this usergroup can delete comments.
Members of this usergroup can delete entries completely.

Members of this usergroup can delete images.

Members of this usergroup can edit comments.
Members of this usergroup can edit files.
Members of this usergroup can edit images.
Members of this usergroup can enable entries.
Members of this usergroup can move entries.
Members of this usergroup can view entries which are in the recycle bin.
Please enter the allowed file extensions of attachments. One extension per line.
Please enter the allowed file extensions of files. One extension per line.
Please enter the allowed file extensions of images. One extension per line.
Members of this usergroup can add entries.
Members of this usergroup can add entries without moderation. The Entries are enabled by default.
Members of this usergroup can comment entries.
Members of this usergroup can delete their own entries.
Members of this usergroup can delete their own comments.
Members of this usergroup can delete their own files.
Members of this usergroup can delete their own images.
Members of this usergroup can download/view attachments.
Members of this usergroup can download files.
Members of this usergroup can edit their own entries.
Members of this usergroup can edit their own comments.
Members of this usergroup can edit their own files.
Members of this usergroup can edit their own images.
Members of this usergroup can enter categories.
Members of this usergroup can rate entries.
Members of this usergroup can assign prefixes to entries.
Members of this usergroup can set tags for entries.
Members of this usergroup can upload attachments.
Members of this usergroup can view categories.
Members of this usergroup can view entries.
Members of this user group can view the preview of attachments.
Can view filebase in offline mode
Members of this usergroup can view the filebase even if it is disabled.
Members of this usergroup can view their own entries.
Please enter the maximum number of attachments which members of this usergroup can upload to their entries.
Please enter the maximum size of attachement files in bytes.
Please enter the maximum size of files in bytes.
Please enter the maximum height of files in pixels.
Please enter the maximum size of images in bytes.
Please enter the maximum width of files in pixels.
Please enter the maximum number of files which members of this usergroup can upload to their entries.
Please enter the maximum number of images which members of this usergroup can upload to their entries.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Enter the number of points a user receives for adding an entry.
By enabling this option a general statistic will be displayed on the category page.
The category page shows the most used tags within this category. By clicking on one of the tags you can filter the entries list.
Specify a time period for entries to be displayed.
Specify the order of displayed entries.
If you enable this filter, only the entries of the current interface language of the active guest are displayed.
Enter the number of entries to be displayed per page.
Show last entry of the category
By enabling this option the last entry of each category will be displayed.
By enabling this option detailed statistics of each category will be displayed.
By enabling this option direct sub categories of each category will be displayed.
Enter the number of days after recycled entries should to be deleted automatically. Please enter "0" to disable the automatic deletion.
By enabling this option entries can be rated.
By enabling this option entries are being moved to the recycle bin before being permanently deleted. Entries in the recycle bin can be restored until their automatic deletion.
By enabling this option users can add tags to an entry that are displayed in a tag cloud.
Enter the number of files to be displayed per page.
Enter the number of images to be displayed per page.
By enabling this option the last five comments will be displayed on the entry overview page.
By enabling this option the last five files will be displayed on the entry overview page.
By enabling this option the last five images will be displayed on the entry overview page.
By enabling this option a general statistic will be displayed on the main page of the filebase.
By enabling this option the main page will show the most used tags of the whole filebase.
Enables the comment system for entries.
This note is displayed while the filebase is disabled.
By enabling this option you can use HTML code in the deactivation note.
Show last entries of a user in his profile
Should the lasts five entries of a user be displayed in his profile?
Show current time in page footer
By enabling this option the current time will be displayed in the page footer.
By enabling this option a list of all available styles will be displayed displayed in the footer of the page.
Show filebase version number in copyright notice
By enabling this option the filebase version number will be displayed in the copyright notice.

category.name: wcf.user.option
category.item: Please enter the number of entries to be displayed on each page.
Specify the time entries should be displayed within the categories.

category.name: wsif.acp.category
category.item: Currently there are no categories available.
Do you really want to delete this prefix?
Filter and sorting options of the entries
Please select the language of the following texts.
Please enter the position number of this category. The categories are sorted according to these numbers.

category.name: wsif.acp.entry.prefix
category.item: Choose the categories for which the prefix should be available.
Do you really want to delete this prefix?
Please select the language of the prefix please.
Here you can change the way this prefix is shown using a HTML-format marking. Using <strong>%s</strong> for example would make the prefix be shown in bold.
Enter the name of the prefix here.
Please enter the position number of this prefix. The prefixes are sorted according to these numbers.
Currently there are no prefixes available.

category.name: wsif.acp.index
category.item: WCF Solutions Infinite Filebase Administration Control Panel
The following optional updates are currently available.
The following recommended updates are currently available.

category.name: wsif.category
category.item: Do you really want to delete this entry? Enter a reason optional.
Do you really want to delete this entry?
Do you really want to delete this entry finally?
[Do you really want to delete the selected entries? Enter a reason optional.
Do you really want to delete all selected entries?
this.count == 1 ? "One entry selected" : this.count+" entries selected"
Subscribe to entries of this category

{#$category->getEntries()} {if $category->getEntries() == 1}entry{else}entries{/if}{if MODULE_COMMENT} - {#$category->getEntryComments()} comment{if $category->getEntryComments() != 1}s{/if}{/if} - {#$category->getEntryImages()} image{if $category->getEntryImages() != 1}s{/if} - {#$category->getEntryFiles()} file{if $category->getEntryFiles() != 1}s{/if} - {#$category->getEntryDownloads()} download{if $category->getEntryDownloads() != 1}s{/if} ({#$category->getEntryDownloadsPerDay()} download{if $category->getEntryDownloadsPerDay() != 1}s{/if} per day)

category.name: wsif.entry
category.item: Your entry was added successfully. It needs to be checked and approved by a moderator before it is made visible to members.

This entry will be deleted finally in {@$entry->deleteTime+ENTRY_EMPTY_RECYCLE_BIN_CYCLE*86400|datediff}.{/if}
